Package org.miktim.websocket

WebSocket server and client package

Release notes:
- Java SE 1.6+, Android compatible;
- meets the requirements of the RFC 6455 ;
- supported WebSocket version: 13;
- WebSocket extensions (Per-Message Deflate, BBF USP, ...) not supported;
- supports cleartext/TLS connections;
- client supports IDNs (Internationalized Domain Names);
- stream-based messaging.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    WsConnection.EventHandler Deprecated
    Use WsConnection.Handler interface instead.
    WsConnection.Handler
    WebSocket connection events handler.
    WsServer.EventHandler Deprecated
    Use WsServer.Handler interface instead.
    WsServer.Handler
    WebSocket server events handler.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    WebSocket
    WebSocket servers and client connections factory.
    WsConnection
    WebSocket client side or server side connection.
    WsParameters
    WebSocket connection parameters.
    WsServer
    WebSocket server for cleartext or TLS connections.
    WsStatus
    WebSocket connection status.

Package org.miktim.websocket Description

WebSocket server and client package

Release notes:
- Java SE 1.6+, Android compatible;
- meets the requirements of the RFC 6455 ;
- supported WebSocket version: 13;
- WebSocket extensions (Per-Message Deflate, BBF USP, ...) not supported;
- supports cleartext/TLS connections;
- client supports IDNs (Internationalized Domain Names);
- stream-based messaging.
